  2. Classes and Interfaces

Unnamed Package

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    appLauncher
    appLauncher initalizes the firebaseAuth and starts the splash screen
    DietAppMainScreen
    MainScreen class to display the tableView of meals in the database as well as menuItems to quit and menuItems to update the users profile
    FirebaseAuthService
    FirebaseAuthService controller to facilitate user login and authentication
    firebaseDBController
    fireBaseDBController class that can be called to get the specific instance of the firestore database the constructor takes in the uID to find specific user data
    LoginScreen
    LoginScreen for users to enter their username/pass to gain access to the main screen new users can also register an account if they dont already have one
    MealEntry
    public MealEntry class that is used for display in a tableView as well as values to be stored in the firestore db
    ProfileScreen
    Profile screen that displays current user values and allows user to update these values
    registerScreen
    RegisterScreen to be accessed from the login Screen for new users to register a new account in the firebase auth
    registerUser
    Class with methods to register a new user
    SplashScreen
    SplashScreen Class that pauses for 3 seconds after start up and then transferrers the users to the login screen
